item.title: How I Made this Hugo Site
item.description: Bascially, I follow the tutorial of Hugo (Quick Start) to set up this website. The website of tutoials I read are https://gohugo.io/hosting-and-deployment/hosting-on-github/ , https://gohugo.io/getting-started/quick-start/ Step 1: Install Hugo. Step 2: Create the new hugo site using the command line. Step 3: Download and install a theme from Github or the official website of Hugo. Step 4: You can start the Hugo server, and add your contents in the file of the /new_site/content/posts.
